Despicable Me 3 is the third of Despicable Me film series follow ing the previous film. Spending a peace ful life with his wife Gru learns that a new villain called Balthazar Bratt who used to be hornoured as a TV child actor around 1980 s emerges himself making an attempt to conquer the world To make the wold as he hopes he also has to confront with Gru to perform the misdemeanour Meanwhile Minions quit being under Gru s wing since he is not back as a villain anymore. So another third installment an imation flick !! Twice in a row !!. I really liked the Despicable Me movies not Minions But it s a shame that the c enter character of Gru doesn't get any attention Especially when it comes to the marketing campaign They really are pushing the Minions hard and this movie really exposes just how unimportant the Minions really are If their solo movie didn t do that already ...). This movie feels like 4 different movies glued together It s part Gru s story about him and his brother Then t here's Lucy s story about how she has to learn to become a mom Then t here's the villain arc and it s also a part Minions movie. The an imation is very vibrant as always and the quick moving action is definitely fun to see However I feel like because the Minion brand has become bigger than ever this feels like a sequel that was forced out to cash in on the popularity of the c haracter without any interesting story to back it up.
